name: bulkSearchImages
description: This endpoint runs up to 5 image searches in a single request and returns up to 20 results per search. You can provide global search parameters in the query parameters and override them for each search in the body parameter. The query and body parameters are the same as in the `GET /v2/images/search` endpoint.

added_date.description: Show images added on the specified date

added_date_start.description: Show images added on or after the specified date

aspect_ratio_min.description: Show images with the specified aspect ratio or higher, using a positive decimal of the width divided by the height, such as 1.7778 for a 16:9 image

aspect_ratio_max.description: Show images with the specified aspect ratio or lower, using a positive decimal of the width divided by the height, such as 1.7778 for a 16:9 image

aspect_ratio.description: Show images with the specified aspect ratio, using a positive decimal of the width divided by the height, such as 1.7778 for a 16:9 image

added_date_end.description: Show images added before the specified date

category.description: Show images with the specified Shutterstock-defined category; specify a category name or ID

color.description: Specify either a hexadecimal color in the format '4F21EA' or 'grayscale'; the API returns images that use similar colors

contributor.description: Show images with the specified contributor names or IDs, allows multiple

contributor_country.description: Show images from contributors in one or more specified countries, or start with NOT to exclude a country from the search

fields.description: Fields to display in the response; see the documentation for the fields parameter in the overview section

height.description: (Deprecated; use height_from and height_to instead) Show images with the specified height

height_from.description: Show images with the specified height or larger, in pixels

height_to.description: Show images with the specified height or smaller, in pixels

image_type.description: Show images of the specified type

keyword_safe_search.description: Hide results with potentially unsafe keywords

language.description: Set query and result language (uses Accept-Language header if not set)

license.description: Show only images with the specified license

model.description: Show image results with the specified model IDs

orientation.description: Show image results with horizontal or vertical orientation

people_model_released.description: Show images of people with a signed model release

people_age.description: Show images that feature people of the specified age category

people_ethnicity.description: Show images with people of the specified ethnicities, or start with NOT to show images without those ethnicities

people_gender.description: Show images with people of the specified gender

people_number.description: Show images with the specified number of people

region.description: Raise or lower search result rankings based on the result's relevance to a specified region; you can provide a country code or an IP address from which the API infers a country

spellcheck_query.description: Spellcheck the search query and return results on suggested spellings

view.description: Amount of detail to render in the response

width.description: (Deprecated; use width_from and width_to instead) Show images with the specified width

width_from.description: Show images with the specified width or larger, in pixels

width_to.description: Show images with the specified width or smaller, in pixels

body.description: List of queries to request results for and filters to apply per query; these values override the defaults in the query parameters

$block: List of search results for each given query

$ul: **bulk_search_id**: Unique identifier for the search request
